feed.title: Category: Revenge of Shinobi | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Revenge of Shinobi (GEN, 1989)
entry.content:
I played through the first level of this game. Compared to Strider it is a lot more interesting, but the hit detection and the speed are way too painful to really enjoy. I also greatly disliked that the attack was limited by a small amount of ammo.

Total time: 0:08
